bdglue2.publisher.kafka

Class KafkaProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdglue2.publisher.kafka.KafkaProperties

  • public class KafkaProperties
extends Object
    Inspired by org.apache.flume.sink.kafka.KafkaSinkConstants. Manage properties associated with delivery of data to Kafka.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String BATCH_SIZE_FLUME
      The Flume event property that sets the batch size for writes to Kafka.

      The default batch size.
      static int DEFAULT_FLUSH_FREQ
      Force flush of accumulated records after ths number of milliseconds in low volume situations where batch size has note yet been met.

      The default serializer for the Kafka partitioning key.

      • BATCH_SIZE_FLUME

        public static final String BATCH_SIZE_FLUME
        The Flume event property that sets the batch size for writes to Kafka.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MESSAGE_SERIALIZER

        public static final String MESSAGE_SERIALIZER
        Property that identifies the serializer to use for writing the Kafka event body. Note that there is property may be set either in the Flume configuration file for Flume delivery, or in the BDGlue properties file for use by the KafkaPublisher.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • KEY_SERIALIZER

        public static final String KEY_SERIALIZER
        Property that identifies the serializer to use for writing the Kafka partitioning key value. Note that there is property may be set either in the Flume configuration file for Flume delivery, or in the BDGlue properties file for use by the KafkaPublisher.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BROKER_LIST

        public static final String BROKER_LIST
        Property that identifies the Kafka broker list to use when deliverying to Kafka. Note that there is property may be set either in the Flume configuration file for Flume delivery, or in the BDGlue properties file for use by the KafkaPublisher. The broker list is comma separated.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REQUIRED_ACKS

        public static final String REQUIRED_ACKS
        Property that identifies how to require acks from Kafka. Note that there is property may be set either in the Flume configuration file for Flume delivery, or in the BDGlue properties file for use by the KafkaPublisher.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BROKER_LIST_FLUME

        public static final String BROKER_LIST_FLUME
        The Flume coniguration property for specifying the broker list to the KafkaSink.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REQUIRED_ACKS_FLUME

        public static final String REQUIRED_ACKS_FLUME
        The Flume coniguration property for specifying the required acks value to the KafkaSink.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_BATCH_SIZE

        public static final int DEFAULT_BATCH_SIZE
        The default batch size.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_FLUSH_FREQ

        public static final int DEFAULT_FLUSH_FREQ
        Force flush of accumulated records after ths number of milliseconds in low volume situations where batch size has note yet been met.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_TOPIC

        public static final String DEFAULT_TOPIC
        The default topic to publish to in the event that one is not specified.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_MESSAGE_SERIALIZER

        public static final String DEFAULT_MESSAGE_SERIALIZER
        The default message serializer to use when writing the event body. It is not likely that this value will need to be overridden.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_KEY_SERIALIZER

        public static final String DEFAULT_KEY_SERIALIZER
        The default serializer for the Kafka partitioning key. It is not likely that this value will need to be overridden.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_REQUIRED_ACKS

        public static final String DEFAULT_REQUIRED_ACKS
        The default value for requiring acks from Kafka after write.

        0: producer never waits for an ack.

        1: producer waits for an ack from the replica leader.

        -1: producer waits for an ack from all replicas.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
